sidebarIssue.rootCause: The Sidebar component uses 'fixed' positioning with 'h-screen' but the nav element has no overflow handling. The sidebar's nav section lacks 'overflow-y-auto' and 'flex-1' to make it scrollable when content exceeds available height.
sidebarIssue.fix: Add 'flex flex-col' to the aside element, wrap the nav in a container with 'flex-1 overflow-y-auto' to allow scrolling when content overflows.

densityIssues.issue: Card footer has 5 buttons crammed together with no clear hierarchy. Icons are small (h-3.5 w-3.5) making them feel cramped.
densityIssues.fix: Group actions into primary (Run) and secondary (dropdown menu for Edit, Delete, Test, Logs). Increase icon sizes.

densityIssues.issue: CardHeader has pb-3 but CardContent and CardFooter use default p-6 pt-0, creating inconsistent vertical rhythm.
densityIssues.fix: Increase vertical spacing between sections. Use larger font sizes for key information.

densityIssues.issue: Stats cards have p-6 padding but visual content is small. The stat value (text-2xl) and label (text-sm) create awkward size contrast.
densityIssues.fix: Increase stat value size to text-3xl or text-4xl for emphasis. Use lighter icon backgrounds.

densityIssues.issue: Card component uses shadow-sm which is very subtle. CardHeader uses space-y-1.5 which is tight.
densityIssues.fix: Use larger shadow (shadow or shadow-md) for better card definition. Increase space-y to 2 or 2.5.

densityIssues.issue: Header height of h-16 with h1 text-xl feels underutilized and empty.
densityIssues.fix: Increase title to text-2xl or increase header height to h-20 with better use of space.

densityIssues.issue: Primary color (221 83% 33%) is very saturated deep blue that feels dated. No dark mode support.
densityIssues.fix: Use a more modern blue with lower saturation. Add hover/active color variations.

recommendations.description: Add overflow-y-auto to Sidebar nav section to prevent content clipping
Reduce TaskCard button count by grouping into a dropdown menu - keep only Run and Test as primary actions
Increase page padding from p-6 to p-8 for more breathing room
Increase gap between grid items from gap-4 to gap-6
Increase TaskCard title from text-base to text-lg, and stat values from text-2xl to text-3xl
Update primary color to a more modern, slightly desaturated blue (217 91% 60%)
Increase Card shadow from shadow-sm to shadow for better depth perception
Reduce TaskList grid columns: change from 4 columns at xl to 3 columns max
